title: Bard 105+ meep stacking
body: so it says +15 on each 5 more chimes you get at that point, but it says you get +15 per 5 chimes addition to the other bonuses. Does that mean +30 damage per 5 meeps at that point? (prob wont get to that amount of chimes anyway)

replies.body:
As far as I can see the stacking is infinite as long as you're picking the chimes up.

Bard actually has insane damage scaling which is fun to play with, and it's very deceptive and underestimated.
You can certainly surprise a player or two if you take Bard somewhere other than Support.

Actually a friend had me record this game for them the other day, sorry it's kinda boring since it's just a recording of the replay.
